data.comment: Barnsley kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Cauley Woodrow (Barnsley) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's Coventry with the kick-off after the break.
Dominik Frieser is on a sub for Michal Helik for Barnsley.
In the minute 59, The home team replace Luke Thomas with Elliot Simoes.
Coventry make their first substitution with Jordan Shipley replacing Ben Sheaf.
Mark Robins is making the team's second substitution at Oakwell Ground with Tyler Walker replacing Jamie Allen.
In the minute 79, Patrick Schmidt is replacing Conor Chaplin for the home team.
Callum Styles (Barnsley) gets a yellow card.
At Oakwell Ground, Alex Mowatt has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 87, Fankaty Dabo (Coventry) has received a first yellow card.
Josh Smith blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
Gustavo Hamer is booked for the away team.
